review: I have been on flecanide for 19 years, it has been a wonder drug controlling my SVT, with no side effects.
Tambocor (flecainide):I began Tambocor nearly 10 years ago when frequency of episodes increased to weekly. I have had no bouts of tachycardia since.
I have been on flecainide for around 25 years now. It controls my condition well and have no side effects so far.

My son who is eight and a half months old has been on flecainide for almost eight months. It has worked wonders.  he has had no side effects, and has had no SVT episodes. I am very grateful for this drug.
